page.title: 12Changing times on Papa Stour
page.content: In 1962 the islanders of Papa Stour got piped water which made life much easier.The water comes from{Gorda- {Water}which is a deep loch in the centre of the island.Before then people had to get all their drinking water and water for washing from wells.The nearest well to my house is {Chapel well}which is 400'm away! Sometimes in the summer the wells dried up and water had to be carried from Gorda-Water (1km).Water also had to be carried to the animals and on a windy day you would only have half a bucket of water left! Two years later the first generator came and people were able to have electric lights.Before that they used gas lights or Tilly lamps.In the same year the first television set arrived. This year we got channel 4,now we have four T.V. channels.
